name: Greentape
overview:
Greentape is a mobile rewards platform that is powered by presence, the best rewards are earned when Greentape App users shop with their friends, amplify their signal or start a combo. It is a combination of UrbanSpoon and ShopKick with a focus on organic food retail.

Greentape uses a patent pending sensor technology to passively or actively detect a users presence as they walk into a partnered retail location. By default, user identities are not shared to spread or stored in anyway. Each App user is given a User ID number based on their demographics. Users may unlock their identities by choice and publish their Greentape activities on any major social network.
